titleStmt.title: To LIEUT-COLONEL EDWARD BRUCE HAMLEY,Edward Bruce Hamley (1824-93; Oxford Dictionary of National Biography), soldier and writer. Brevet Lieut.-Col RA 1855; Professor of Military History, Sandhurst 1859-64; Commandant 1870-77; Major-Gen. 1879; KCMG 1880. Published military works; essays on Voltaire and Carlyle; and contributed to Fraser's and Blackwood's Magazine, including 'Remonstrance with Dickens' (Blackwood's 81 [Apr 1857]: 490).
